title: 648: CRYPTO TRADER PREDICTS $150K BITCOIN TOP THIS BULL CYCLE, FOLLOWED BY A CORRECTION TO $32K!!!!!
description:
When near-term BTC confusion prevails, sometimes it's best to take a step back to see the bigger picture of where the market is and what possibilities the future holds.

According Crypto trader Inmortal, Bitcoin's 4-year cycle is currently about 65% through its bull-market phase and he predicts a top at $150K, which will be followed by a correction to $32K.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
